"Xiera": "If you use Point Assist well, you'll be able to take enemies down much more quickly!"
"If you learn the Class Skill <red>\"Support Fire\"<c>, the effect of Point Assist will be applied to the entire enemy."
"I recommend you focus on mastering both of these Class Skills!"
"Finally, let's review what you've learned with some practical training!"

"Support Fire is a Class Skill that makes your Pets deal additional damage to any enemy marked with Point Assist, in addition to the effect of Point Assist itself.

The damage boost amounts of Point Assist and Support Fire are not necessarily the same."
